about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Seditionis: Crutarch Royale. This current version of the soundtrack is the same version as Seditionis: Tower Defense except that this soundtrack will always add new, custom made music from our AAA music composers over time.

As we add new soundtracks, we will raise the price of this soundtrack but buying it now while it is cheaper means you get all these new music tracks for free before every price increase!

The soundtracks here will mostly consist of orchestral music but other genres may be present.
detailed_description:

The soundtracks here will mostly consist of orchestral music but other genres may be present.
legal_notice: Seditionis, Crutarch, Dragonfire Studios, and Dragonflare Studios are all registered or registering trademarks of Dragonflare Studios LLC and Junson Chan.
